abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its Stardrake's Cavernous Jaws is 4.

abilities.name: Extremis Chamber
abilities.description: Most scarce of Sigmar's forces are the Extremis chambers, with each Stormcast mounted on a living weapon. To draw near these warriors is to risk being scoured by lightning or flame.
abilities.effect: Each time you make an unmodified save roll of 6 for a combat attack that targets this unit, inflict 1 mortal damage on the attacking unit after the Fight ability has been resolved.

abilities.name: Monstrous Challenge
abilities.timing: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Combat Phase
abilities.description: Though not strictly holding the rank of knight, the Drakesworn Templars fulfil a similar role within the Extremis chambers, charging off to face the greatest threats in single combat.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy Monster in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect:
Roll a dice. On a 2+, for the rest of the turn:
•Add 1 to the Damage characteristic of this unit's Stardrake's Cavernous Jaws for attacks that target that unit.
•If the target is also a Hero, add 1 to the Damage characteristic of this unit's Templar Weapons for attacks that target that unit.
